TypeSignature.Value: public class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageEnumerator extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MessageEnumerator Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
public ref class MessageEnumerator : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type MessageEnumerator = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IEnumerator interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供順向資料指標，進而列舉訊息佇列中的訊息。

span.span: Provides a forward-only cursor to enumerate through messages in a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用動態互動佇列中的訊息。Use for dynamic interaction with messages in a queue. 方法可透過類別可以傳回指向動態清單的訊息佇列或陣列，其中包含佇列的指定瞬間-快照集-在複本，在時間中指定的方法呼叫。Methods available through the class can return either a pointing to a dynamic list of messages in the queue, or an array that contains a copy at a given instant - a snapshot - of the queue at the time the specified method was called. 與不同的是靜態的快照集，列舉程式可讓您修改集合。Unlike a static snapshot, an enumerator allows you to modify the collection. 使用您可以從佇列移除訊息，此變更會立即反映在佇列中。Using a , you can remove messages from the queue, and the change is immediately reflected in the queue. 時，它會查詢佇列的列舉值將不會從佇列移除訊息。An enumerator does not remove the messages from the queue when it queries the queue. 它會傳回在目前的游標位置，訊息的相關資訊，但會將訊息留在佇列中。It returns information about the message at the current cursor position, but it leaves the message in the queue. A是資料指標，初始化為動態清單的標頭。A is a cursor, initialized to the head of a dynamic list. 清單的順序是在佇列中，訊息的順序相同根據訊息的優先權。The list order is the same as the order of the messages in the queue, according to message priority. 您可以將游標移到佇列中的第一個訊息藉由呼叫。You can move the cursor to the first message in the queue by calling . 在初始化列舉值之後，您可以使用逐步剩餘的訊息。After the enumerator has been initialized, you can use to step forward through the remaining messages. 您可以指定是否要等候訊息變成可用，藉由傳遞到逾時方法。You can specify whether to wait for a message to become available by passing a timeout into the method. 列舉值是動態的因為一則訊息，附加資料指標的目前位置 （例如，因為低優先順序），之後可以存取列舉值。Because the enumerator is dynamic, a message that is appended beyond the cursor's current position (for example, due to low priority), can be accessed by the enumerator. 無法存取資料指標的目前位置之前插入訊息。A message that is inserted before the cursor's current position cannot be accessed. 不可能向後步驟來搭配。It is not possible to step backward with a . 資料指標可讓順向移動。A cursor allows forward-only movement. 方法可讓您將游標放回佇列的開頭。The method enables you to place the cursor back at the beginning of the queue. 執行個體指定佇列的作業，互不影響。Instances of for a given queue work independently. 您可以建立兩個套用至相同的佇列的執行個體。You can create two instances that apply to the same queue. 所做的變更，其中對佇列中訊息將會立即反映在第二個列舉值如果第二個列舉值會位於第一個。The changes that one makes to the messages in the queue will be reflected immediately in a second enumerator if the second enumerator is positioned before the first. 不過，如果兩個列舉值具有相同的位置，且其中移除該位置的訊息，例外狀況會擲回其他列舉程式會嘗試取得的值如果現在刪除的訊息上的屬性。However, if two enumerators have the same position and one of them removes the message at that position, an exception is thrown if the other enumerator attempts to get the value of the property on the now-deleted message. > [!NOTE] > 如果您建立的執行個體具有設定為`true`，沒有其他應用程式可以修改您的列舉值中的訊息，而有佇列的連接。If you create an instance of with set to `true`, no other application can modify the messages in your enumerator while you have the connection to the queue. ## Examples 下列範例會取得佇列中的動態清單的訊息，並計算的所有訊息屬性設定為。The following example gets a dynamic list of messages in a queue and counts all messages with the property set to . [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CPP/mqgetmessageenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/CS/mqgetmessageenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.GetMessageEnumerator/VB/mqgetmessageenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放與列舉值相關的資源。

span.span: Frees the resources associated with the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作業系統會在資料指標的存留期間保留佇列的開啟控制代碼。The operating system retains an open handle to the queue during the lifetime of the cursor. 當您完成使用列舉值時，呼叫釋放控制代碼相關聯的資源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release the resources associated with the handle.

summary.span: 取得這個列舉值指向的目前 。

span.span: Gets the current that this enumerator points to.
The current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立列舉值時，它會指向的佇列，在第一個訊息之前的位置標頭。When the enumerator is created, it points to the head of the queue, at a location before the first message. 在此情況下，無效，將會擲回例外狀況，如果它存取。In this case, is not valid and will throw an exception if it is accessed. 您必須呼叫若要將指標放在佇列中的第一個訊息。You must call to position the cursor at the first message in the queue.

exception.span: 在第一次呼叫 之前，請先呼叫 。

exception.span: 資料指標位於訊息列舉型別的第一個項目前面。

span.span: The cursor is located before the first element of the message enumeration.

span.span: You called after a call to had returned (indicating the cursor is located after the last element of the message enumeration.)

exception.span: 列舉值目前指向的訊息已經不存在。

span.span: The message the enumerator is currently pointing to no longer exists.

exception.span: 可能已遭刪除。

span.span: It might have been deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含列舉型別原生控制代碼。This property contains the native handle to the enumeration. 當您完成使用列舉值時，呼叫釋放此資源。When you have finished working with the enumerator, call to release this resource.

exception.span: 控制代碼不存在。

span.span: The handle does not exist.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫可讓所使用的資源重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.span: Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
Implementing a Dispose method
Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放列舉值所使用的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources held by the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的 Finalize 方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's Finalize method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100))，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v=vs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 讓列舉值前進至佇列中的下一個訊息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveNext() cil managed
abstract member MoveNext : unit -> bool override this.MoveNext : unit -> bool

summary.span: 如果目前有可用的列舉值，讓列舉值前進至佇列中的下一個訊息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue, if one is currently available.

returns.span: 如果列舉值成功地前移至下一則訊息則為 ，如果列舉值已到達佇列結尾則為 。

span.span: if the enumerator was succesfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果佇列中沒有任何訊息這個多載會立即傳回。This overload returns immediately if there is no message in the queue. 沒有會等候指定的另一個多載抵達的訊息。There is another overload that waits a specified for a message to arrive. 如果訊息沒有目前因為佇列是空的或是因為已超過集合中的最後一個項目傳回`false`至呼叫的方法。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, returns `false` to the calling method. 建立後，列舉值會在概念上位於佇列中，以及第一次呼叫的第一個訊息之前帶入檢視的第一則訊息的佇列。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the queue, and the first call to brings the first message of the queue into view.

exception.span: 擲回訊息佇列的特定例外狀況。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function MoveNext (timeout As TimeSpan) As Boolean

param.name: timeout
param.span: 如果列舉值已經位於佇列的末端， 等待訊息變成可用所需的時間。

span.span: The to wait for a message to be available if the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue.

summary.span: 讓列舉值前進至佇列中的下一個訊息。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next message in the queue.

summary.span: 如果列舉值已位於佇列的結尾， 會一直等待，直到有可用的訊息或指定的逾時到期為止。

span.span: If the enumerator is positioned at the end of the queue, waits until a message is available or the given timeout expires.

returns.span: 如果列舉值成功地前進到下一個訊息，則為 ；如果列舉值已經到達佇列的末端，而且在 參數指定的時間之內訊息尚未變成可用，則為 。

span.span: if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next message; if the enumerator has reached the end of the queue and a message does not become available within the time specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果佇列中沒有任何訊息，或如果資料指標已到達佇列結尾，則會等待這個多載。This overload waits if there is no message in the queue or if the cursor has reached the end of the queue. 如果訊息沒有目前因為佇列是空的或是因為已超過集合中的最後一個項目等候指定的逾時。If a message is not currently available because the queue is empty or because you have moved beyond the last element in the collection, waits the specified timeout. 如果游標已經在佇列結尾處只會傳回`true`新郵件抵達時指定的時間間隔內，如果目前在佇列中具有較低的優先順序高於所有訊息，並放置在佇列結尾。If the cursor is already at the end of the queue, only returns `true` if the new message arrives within the specified time interval, has lower priority than all messages currently in the queue and is placed at the end of the queue. 如果沒有進一步的訊息會在佇列中不含參數的多載會立即傳回。An overload with no parameter returns immediately if no further messages are in the queue. 建立後，列舉程式會在概念上位於列舉型別，以及第一次呼叫的第一個訊息之前帶來的列舉型別檢視的第一個訊息。Upon creation, an enumerator is conceptually positioned before the first message of the enumeration, and the first call to brings the first message of the enumeration into view.

exception.span: 為逾時參數指定的值無效。

span.span: The value specified for the timeout parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 可能表示負數。

span.span: It might represent a negative number.

exception.span: 擲回訊息佇列的特定例外狀況。

span.span: An exception specific to Message Queuing was thrown.
-or-

exception.span: 已經逾時。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

summary.span: 從佇列中移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 移除訊息會將它從佇列中刪除。

span.span: Removing the message deletes it from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述這些多載的行為是適用於只有當擷取執行個體使用。The behavior described for these overloads is applicable only if the instance is retrieved by using the . 請勿使用若要擷取的執行個體，此方法已被取代。Do not use to retrieve an instance of as this method has been deprecated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent() cil managed

summary.span: 從異動或非異動性佇列中移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional or non-transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 沒有為訊息到達佇列指定逾時。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置的訊息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling . 如果您在交易式佇列上呼叫這個多載，訊息佇列會建立單一的內部交易。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定移除訊息異動的 物件。

span.span: The object that specifies the transaction in which the message will be removed.

summary.span: 從異動佇列中移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 沒有為訊息到達佇列指定逾時。

span.span: There is no timeout specified for a message to arrive in the queue.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置，使用所定義的內部交易內容訊息`transaction`參數。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using the internal transaction context defined by the `transaction` parameter. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當使用交易式佇列，交易回復會導致移除呼叫的任何訊息傳回至佇列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 移除不是無法復原，直到交易認可為止。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .

Public Function RemoveCurrent (transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 其中一個 值，描述要與訊息相關聯的異動內容的類型。

span.span: One of the values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.

summary.span: 從佇列移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置，使用交易內容所定義的訊息`transactionType`參數。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 指定`Automatic`針對`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易的內容附加至您想要用來接收訊息的執行緒。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果您想要接收的訊息視為單一的內部交易。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 您可以指定`None`如果您想要從交易內容外的異動式佇列接收訊息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當使用交易式佇列，交易回復會導致移除呼叫的任何訊息傳回至佇列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 移除不是無法復原，直到交易認可為止。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 參數不是其中一個 成員。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the members.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待訊息到達佇列的時間間隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for a message to arrive in the queue.

summary.span: 從佇列中移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from the queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的訊息，方法會立即將它傳回。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否則，方法會為新訊息的到達等待指定的逾時。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置的訊息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果游標位於佇列的結尾，這個方法的多載會等到有可用訊息，或指定的間隔`timeout`參數已過期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling . 如果您在交易式佇列上呼叫這個多載，訊息佇列會建立單一的內部交易。If you call this overload on a transactional queue, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction.

exception.span: 為 參數指定的值無效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 已經逾時。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransaction transaction) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan, transaction As MessageQueueTransaction) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待移除訊息的時間間隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for the message to be removed.

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定訊息異動內容的 物件。

span.span: The object that specifies the transaction context for the message.

summary.span: 從異動佇列中移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from a transactional queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的訊息，方法會立即將它傳回。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否則，方法會為新訊息的到達等待指定的逾時。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置的訊息。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location. 如果游標位於佇列的結尾，這個方法的多載會等到有可用訊息，或指定的間隔`timeout`參數已過期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 當使用交易式佇列，交易回復會導致移除呼叫的任何訊息傳回至佇列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 移除不是無法復原，直到交易認可為止。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 為 參數指定的值無效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 參數為 。

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 已經逾時。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Messaging.Message RemoveCurrent(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, valuetype System.Messaging.MessageQueueTransactionType transactionType) cil managed
Public Function RemoveCurrent (timeout As TimeSpan, transactionType As MessageQueueTransactionType) As Message

param.name: timeout
param.span: 等待移除訊息的時間間隔。

span.span: The interval of time to wait for the message to be removed.

param.name: transactionType
param.span: 其中一個 值，描述要與訊息相關聯的異動內容的類型。

span.span: One of the values, describing the type of transaction context to associate with the message.

summary.span: 從佇列移除目前的訊息，並將訊息傳回至呼叫的應用程式。

span.span: Removes the current message from a queue and returns the message to the calling application.

summary.span: 如果有要移除的訊息，方法會立即將它傳回。

span.span: If there is a message to remove, the method returns it immediately.

summary.span: 否則，方法會為新訊息的到達等待指定的逾時。

span.span: Otherwise, the method waits the specified timeout for a new message to arrive.

returns.span: ，參考佇列中的第一個可用訊息。

span.span: A that references the first message available in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除並傳回資料指標的目前位置，使用交易內容所定義的訊息`transactionType`參數。 removes and returns the message at the cursor's current location, using a transaction context defined by the `transactionType` parameter. 如果游標位於佇列的結尾，這個方法的多載會等到有可用訊息，或指定的間隔`timeout`參數已過期。If the cursor is at the end of the queue, this overload of the method waits until a message is available or the interval specified by the `timeout` parameter has expired. 指定`Automatic`針對`transactionType`參數，如果已經有外部交易的內容附加至您想要用來接收訊息的執行緒。Specify `Automatic` for the `transactionType` parameter if there is already an external transaction context attached to the thread that you want to use to receive the message. 指定`Single`如果您想要接收的訊息視為單一的內部交易。Specify `Single` if you want to receive the message as a single internal transaction. 您可以指定`None`如果您想要從交易內容外的異動式佇列接收訊息。You can specify `None` if you want to receive a message from a transactional queue outside of a transaction context. 如果您使用佇列的日誌功能，移除該訊息會導致複本保留在日誌佇列，就如同類別的方法會執行。If you are using queue journaling, removing the message causes a copy to be kept in the journal queue, just as the class's method does. 當使用交易式佇列，交易回復會導致移除呼叫的任何訊息傳回至佇列。When working with transactional queues, a rollback of a transaction causes any messages removed by a call to to be returned to the queue. 移除不是無法復原，直到交易認可為止。The removal is not irreversible until the transaction is committed. 當您移除目前的訊息時，就會將游標移至下一個訊息。When you remove the current message, the cursor is moved to the next message. 您沒有呼叫之後呼叫。You do not have to call after calling .

exception.span: 為 參數指定的值無效。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter is invalid.

exception.span: 已經逾時。

span.span: The timeout has expired.

exception.span: 參數不是其中一個 成員。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() cil managed
abstract member Reset : unit -> unit override this.Reset : unit -> unit

summary.span: 重設目前的列舉值，讓它指向佇列的前端。

span.span: Resets the current enumerator so it points to the head of the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只能以正向方向移動。An enumerator can only move in a forward direction. 您可以使用這個方法，佇列的開頭開始。Use this method to start over at the beginning of the queue. 之後呼叫，資料指標會指向第一個訊息。After calling , the cursor points to the first message. 您不需要呼叫之後呼叫來將資料指標向前移到佇列中的第一個訊息。You do not need to call after calling to move the cursor forward to the first message in the queue.

summary.span: 傳回 ，其參考目前游標位置的訊息。

value.span: ，其參考目前游標位置的訊息。

span.span: A that references the message at the current cursor position.

exception.span: 您在第一次呼叫 之前存取這個屬性。

span.span: You accessed this property before the first call to .

exception.span: 資料指標位於訊息列舉的第一個元素之前。或您在 的呼叫傳回了 false 之後，存取了此屬性 (表示資料指標位於訊息列舉的最後一個元素之後。)

span.span: The cursor is located before the first element of the message enumeration.-or- You accessed this property after a call to had returned false (indicating the cursor is located after the last element of the message enumeration.)

exception.span: 列舉值目前指向的訊息已經不存在。

span.span: The message the enumerator is currently pointing to no longer exists.

exception.span: 可能已遭刪除。

span.span: It might have been deleted.
